params.lpTokens: Amount of LP tokens to burn.

returns.rewards: Available rewards that can be harvested.
Total rewards harvested and converted to base asset.

params.minLpOut: Minimum LP tokens expected to prevent slippage.

returns.lpTokensReceived: Actual LP tokens received from the pool join.

params.gauge: The gauge contract address for the pool.
params.lpTokens: Amount of LP tokens to stake.
Amount of LP tokens to unstake.

exitPool(address,uint256,address,address.notice: Remove liquidity from a SwapX pool by burning LP tokens. Approve the adapter to spend your LP tokens first

getPendingRewards(address,address).notice: Check how many rewards an account can claim from the gauge

getPoolApr(address).notice: Get the total yield percentage for a pool (base yield + rewards). APR is scaled by 1e18, so 5% = 0.05e18

getPoolGauge(address).notice: Get the gauge contract for a SwapX pool. Gauges distribute veSwapX rewards to liquidity providers

getPoolLpToken(address).notice: Get the LP token contract for a SwapX pool

harvestRewards(address).notice: Collect rewards from the gauge and convert them to base asset when possible. Rewards come from trading fees and veSwapX emissions

joinPool(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Add liquidity to a SwapX pool with two tokens. Make sure to approve the adapter to spend your tokens first

stakeInGauge(address,uint256).notice: Stake LP tokens in the SwapX gauge to earn extra rewards. The gauge controls how incentive tokens and fee rebates are distributed

unstakeFromGauge(address,uint256).notice: Remove LP tokens from the SwapX gauge
